definition: Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Cleopatra (name)/Cleopatra VII Thea Philopator (69-30 BC), the last Egyptian pharaoh

sentences.english: Bart really cleaned up in the card game.
sentences.chinese: 巴特在紙牌有戲中大獲全勝。

sentences.english: Butler right knee injury. Will not return tonight.
sentences.chinese: 巴特勒右膝蓋受傷，今天晚上不會重新出場了。

sentences.english: Ou Ning introducing the only sound art project: Awakening Battersea.
sentences.chinese: 我介紹本次展覽唯一的聲音項目《喚醒巴特西》。

sentences.english: They starred together in the big-screen spectacle Cleopatra, released in 1963.
sentences.chinese: 他們主演的大屏幕奇觀克婁巴特拉在1963。

sentences.english: Black Bart did have his quirks as well.
Mongolian Prime Minister Sukhbaataryn Batbold expressed deep condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古總理巴特包勒德向中國人民表示深切慰問。

sentences.english: Your eyes are pools in Heshbon, by the gate of Bath-rabbim.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼目像希實本巴特那拉並門旁的水池。

sentences.english: Today there have been surprises like the absences of Abate and Flamini.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都對於阿巴特和弗拉米尼的缺陣感到驚訝。

sentences.english: Speak to Matisse and Cleopatra comes to your rescue.
sentences.chinese: 發言馬蒂斯和克婁巴特拉來到你的救援。

sentences.english: I like to go to Battery Park and watch those liners booming in.
sentences.chinese: 我愛巴特里公園，喜歡看着熙熙攘攘的郵輪。

sentences.english: The goalies trained apart under Vecchi and Abate.
sentences.chinese: 門將則在維奇和阿巴特教練的帶領下單獨訓練。

sentences.english: He thought by this little trick to elicit Butler's real name.
sentences.chinese: 他想利用這個小小的花巧辦法誘出巴特勒的真姓名來。

sentences.english: The Egyptian queen Cleopatra loved purple.
sentences.chinese: 埃及女王克婁巴特拉酷愛紫色。

sentences.english: Herbart is one of the representatives of traditional education.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾巴特是傳統教育派的理論代表之一。

sentences.english: News 3. Chinese basketball player Mengke Bateer has got a new job.
sentences.chinese: 新聞三，中國籃球選手巴特爾得到了份新工作。

sentences.english: Mrs. Butler was sitting in rotund complacency at the foot of the table.
sentences.chinese: 巴特勒太太心安理得地坐在桌子的末端。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
